comprehensive_overview: OpenFOAM (Open-source Field Operation And Manipulation) is a free, open-source computational fluid dynamics software package developed by the OpenFOAM Foundation. It is used for numerical simulations of complex fluid flow problems, including computational fluid dynamics (CFD).
core_features: Finite volume method for solving partial differential equations
Pre-processing, solver execution, and post-processing utilities
Variety of built-in solvers for different fluid flow problems
Customization and extensibility through C++ programming
